TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void DrawItemEventHandler(object sender, DrawItemEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed DrawItemEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub DrawItemEventHandler(sender As Object, e As DrawItemEventArgs)
public delegate void DrawItemEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, DrawItemEventArgs ^ e);
type DrawItemEventHandler = delegate of obj * DrawItemEventArgs -> unit

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示将处理 、、 或 控件的 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event of a , , , or control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示一个具有所有者描述的菜单项的菜单。The following code example demonstrates a menu with an owner-drawn menu item. 此示例使用 `AddHandler` 语句和 `AddressOf` 运算符来指定用于处理事件的委托 。This example uses the `AddHandler` statement and the `AddressOf` operator to designate a delegate to handle the event. 若要运行该示例，请将其粘贴到导入系统、System.web 和 System.web 命名空间的窗体中。To run the example place paste it in a form that imports the System, System.Windows.Forms, and System.Drawing namespaces. 确保所有事件都与其事件处理方法关联。Ensure all events are associated with their event-handling methods. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.MenuItemOwnerDraw#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.MenuItemOwnerDraw/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.MenuItemOwnerDraw#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.MenuItemOwnerDraw/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.MenuItemOwnerDraw#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.MenuItemOwnerDraw/VB/form1.vb#1)]
